review: This game.... is indescribable, PLEASE! do yourself the favour of attaining this game and finishing it through!! Gorgeous storyline which is weaved beautifully with that of the original Conan Doyle books. Incredibley engaging, fantastic puzzles which are at all levels difficulty, perfect for anyone who loves puzzles, action, murder and mystery! Just.... WOW! BEAUTIFUL! AMAZING! 10/10!!! Hands down one of the best games ever to have been created.
